title: Single-cell analyses unravel cell type–specific responses to a vitamin D analog in prostatic precancerous lesions
description: Pten(i)pe−/− treated with Gemini-72, a vitamin D analog (Gem72) and non-treated (Control) mice prostates at 9 months after gene inactivation. This experiment unravels diversity of vitamin D’s effects on various cell types of prostatic precancerous lesions.
